solution_line_template: He will need to bring {total_floss_needed} yards of floss because {num_students} x {floss_per_student} = <<{num_students}*{floss_per_student}={total_floss_needed}>>{total_floss_needed}
He has {floss_left_over} yards left over because {floss_per_packet} - {total_floss_needed} = <<{floss_per_packet}-{total_floss_needed}={floss_left_over}>>{floss_left_over}
